Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO CONSUMER PROTECTION

Title: Relates to insurance requirements for third-party food delivery services
Summary: Requires bicycle delivery contractors to provide personal injury liability insurance to compensate persons injured by a bicycle delivery worker and to provide notice to delivery workers that the contractor provides personal injury liability insurance; authorizes the superintendent of financial services to promulgate rules and regulations.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to bicycle delivery worker insurance personal injury liability insurance
